title: Cookies, Cream, and Crumbling Cores
summary: Perseverance’s drives over the last few weeks have doubled back several times. Why such an unconventional route? title: Live coverage: SpaceX Falcon 9 launch to feature first landing attempt in The Bahamas
summary: The Falcon 9 first stage booster, tail number B1080, will target a landing near Exuma, an island within The Bahamas. Liftoff from pad 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station is set for 6 p.m. EST (2300 UTC).
